title: I got demoted from Silver to Bronze
body: omg i suck so much. now we begin the grind...... again.

replies.body: You're still down there what are you doing xD

I can really only play from Monday to Wesnesday as that is the only time I have to play for sure. On other days, I might play a game or two but on those other days I always run the risk of dcing a lot.... Which I have been lololol
I've left once, I can do it again :P I'm confident I can do it again. I've just neglected League so much in the past few months and got that bad at it :/

I don't know if grinding would be that beneficial to you. I haven't see you play I can only comment on  your stats on http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=olee but if you could decrease your deaths substantially you'll cruise back into silver easily. 

Good luck tho :)
Yeah I always get ahead early and then get cocky and go invincible god mode lmao
